results.title: Bryan Norcross Tackles Hurricane Season Questions
results.summary: FOX Weather's Bryan Norcross answers questions about hurricane season, discussing hurricane eye sizes (referencing Hurricane Wilma), the use of AI in forecasting, improvements in forecasting accuracy due to more powerful computers, the origin of 'invest' numbers, and the Madden-Julian Oscillation's effect on storm development. The article highlights the role of technology in modern weather forecasting.

results.title: Pakistan Issues Glacial Floods Alert Amid Heavy Rain
results.summary: Pakistan warns of glacial flooding in the northwest due to above-average monsoon rains, exacerbated by climate change. The report highlights the vulnerability of areas like Fairy Meadows and Gilgit-Baltistan, where infrastructure and communities are severely affected. Zakir Hussein notes the importance of heeding weather warnings. This situation reminds us of the floods in Noah's time (Genesis 6-9), a consequence of sin. Let us be mindful of stewardship of the Earth, but more importantly, mindful of our relationship with God. 'And God saw that the wickedness of man was great in the earth, and that every imagination of the thoughts of his heart was only evil continually.' - Genesis 6:5 (KJV)

results.title: SoCal to See Pleasant Conditions Saturday with Warmer Temps Arriving Next Week
results.summary: A weather forecast from KABC indicates that Southern California will experience mild temperatures on Saturday, July 26, 2025, with warmer temperatures expected to arrive next week. The marine layer is contributing to the unseasonably cool conditions. The article does not directly align with biblical axioms, but weather patterns are part of God's creation (Genesis 1:1).

results.title: Weather Forecast for San Fernando
results.summary: This is a weather forecast for San Fernando, Trinidad and Tobago, providing details on temperature, humidity, wind, and chance of rain. The forecast includes hourly, daily, and 10-day predictions. The Weather Channel claims to be the world's most accurate forecaster. While weather prediction is useful, it is important to remember that 'God is' (Axiom 1) and has ultimate control over the elements. As Matthew 6:27 says, 'Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature?'

results.title: Weather Updates: Wildfires, Heat Waves, and Storms Across the Globe
results.summary: A compilation of weather reports detailing wildfires in the Western US and Greece, heavy rain in the Gulf Coast, heat waves in the Southeast and Midwest, and Canadian wildfire smoke affecting the Northeast. The reports highlight the increasing frequency and intensity of extreme weather events, which aligns with prophetic warnings of tribulations (Matthew 24:7). Consider how these events may be signs of the times and prepare spiritually.
